name: The Kids are alright
description:
The Kids are Alright is a narrative-driven management game. In a post-apocalyptic world where Covid-19 has killed all the adults, the kids are left alone to save the crumbling remains of humanity.

The player, who plays the role of the leader of a small village, faces difficult practical and moral choices, which will determine whether and to what extent the settling will survive and, maybe more importantly, how. Each economic, politic, ethical and personal decision is interwoven in the fabric of the living village and will lead to a different final environment, where you might still be in charge or not.
